title: As of Sunday night, no more foreign travelers in airport detention, officials say
text: "We've worked so hard to come here to express ourselves and live as we should as humans," she added. "I felt like in the past three or four days, all my rights had been stripped and everything I've worked for had been taken away in a snap."
summary:
"We've worked so hard to come here to express ourselves and live as we should as humans," she added.
"I felt like in the past three or four days, all my rights had been stripped and everything I've worked for had been taken away in a snap."
